question: As per the Levels and Trends in Child Mortality 2017 report how many countries are responsible for 50% newborn deaths?
explanation: As per a report titled "Levels and Trends in Child Mortality 2017", India along with Pakistan, Nigeria, Congo and Ethiopia is responsible for half of all new-born deaths in the world. This report has been authored by United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF), World Health Organization (WHO), World Bank Group and United Nations. As per the report, 6 million children died before reaching the age of five in 2016. This marks a decrease as compared to year 2000 in which 9.9 million children had died before turning five.
